resources.string: You don't have any books in your list yet. Use the Menu Add feature to add books.

Use BookWorm to keep track of books you have read, and you intend to read. Maintain a log of books that you can quickly view, sort, and rate.

In the future this application will also be able to synchronize (import/export) with online book sources, and will include more features such as book reviews (in the works).\n

For more information, and to comment or report issues, please visit the BookWorm project site.

*If the scanner works but recognizes a product rather than a book, try looking for a different bar code. Books often have multiple codes. The inside front cover may have another code that is different from the back. Especially for older paperback books, the inside cover code works more reliably.

*Make sure you are not scanning sticker that has been placed over the bar code by a retailer. Many retailers do this, and the proprietary retailer codes will not scan.

*Some books just do not scan. Product codes that cannot be interpreted as ISBNs will not work. In those cases try a web search for the title. It's still pretty quick, and it will likely work.

Current version 1.0.5 Changelog:
 *Fix issue 12 - Force close on some devices with input form (Camera causing issues), use new form, see enh-14.
 *Enhancement 14 - Switch to new entry form, and allow user to select image for cover from gallery (for new, and existing books).
 *Fix issue 15 - Remove HTML from this about/detail dialog. Formatting lost, but better than random (more work to do for this).
 *Fix issue 24 - Make ISBN editable. This allows users to enter correct ISBN, which then can be used to retrieve cover images.
 *Enhancement 25 - Warn on the book add page if the current DB/list already has same book (whether scan or search).
 *Enhancement 26 - Make compatible with Android 1.5 for users still running older release (future may split). 
 Version 1.0.4 Changelog:
 *Enhancement - Add "enable debug logging" option in prefs (to try to help figure out other issues if they arise).
 *Enhancement - Add "Scanning Tips" menu option to no results found page.
 *Fix issue 10 - Force close after scan due to bar code format differences (EAN vs UPC, etc.). Should decode many more books now, and should not force close even when cannot decode.
 *Fix issue 13 - Changing a book's title orphans the cover image.
 
 Version 1.0.3 Changelog:
 *Fix issue 7 - Search web screen repeated results.
 *Fix issue 8 - Search web screen results not saved on orientation change.
 *Fix issue 9 - Search screen remember position in list.
 *Attempt Fix issue 10 - Force close after scan on some devices (this fix is not yet verified).
 
 Please let me know if you come across any new issues, the project site issue tracker is where currently known issues and enhancement plans are logged. Thanks!
